name: Augustus
quoteJp: ゆっくり急げ（急がば回れ）

name: Marcus Aurelius
quoteJp: 今この瞬間に集中せよ

name: Marcus Aurelius
quoteLatin: What we do now echoes in eternity.
quoteEn: What we do now echoes in eternity.
quoteJp: 今我々が行うことは永遠に響き渡る

name: Marcus Aurelius
quoteLatin: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.

name: Marcus Aurelius
quoteLatin: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quoteEn: You have power over your mind, not outside events.
quoteJp: 支配できるのは自分の心であって、外の出来事ではない

name: Hadrian
quoteJp: さすらいの小さな魂よ、前進せよ

name: Trajan
quoteJp: 最良の指導者は奉仕する者である

name: Antoninus Pius
quoteJp: すべてにおいて平静を保て

name: Marcus Aurelius
quoteLatin: Waste no more time arguing what a good man should be. Be one.
quoteEn: Stop debating what a good person is. Be one.
quoteJp: 善人とは何かを議論するな。善人になれ

name: Marcus Aurelius
quoteLatin: The best revenge is not to be like your enemy.
quoteEn: The best revenge is not to be like your enemy.
quoteJp: 最高の復讐は敵のようにならないことだ

name: Augustus
quoteEn: The play is over. Time for applause.
quoteJp: 劇は終わった。さあ拍手を

name: Marcus Aurelius
quoteEn: True rest is found in purposeful action.
quoteJp: 真の休息は目的ある行動の中にある
